author: etan_status
content: Renamed the `PartialContainer` to `StableContainer` to highlight its stable serialization and merkleization across future forks

author: etan_status
content:
Also simplified the specification / Python implementation of the `StableContainer` so that it no longer requires this extra `@dataclass` layer.

Subsequently, EIP-6493 also got cleaner, as `TransactionPayload`, `TransactionSignature`, `PooledTransaction` and `Receipt` can inherit from `StableContainer` directly ðŸ™‚ 

None of the serialization / merkleization / semantics have changed, it's just cleaner now and easier to understand.
